name: The METAJACKET: RTFKT X Toby Evans
description: The META JACKET is RTFKT's first jacket. The METAJACKET embodies RTFKT's vision in a new digital skins economy and creative new age in digital Fashion, reskinned by next gen artist Toby Evans, who has a distinct attitude to design and has worked with industry defying brands such as Versace, adidas Originals, Palace Skateboards, RTFKT, Tommy Hilfiger, Burberry & Boiler Room. In 2020 Toby launched a new creative studio ZOME.
